net.opentsdb.query.expression

类 ExpressionReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.query.expression.ExpressionReader

  • public class ExpressionReader
extends Object
    Parses a Graphite style expression. Please use isEOF() before any method call. Otherwise the methods will throw a NoSuchElementException.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.3

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMark

        public int getMark()
        返回:
        the current index

      • peek

        public char peek()
        返回:
        the current character without advancing the index

      • next

        public char next()
        返回:
        the current character and advances the index

      • skip

        public void skip(int num)
        参数:
        num - the number of characters to skip

      • isNextChar

        public boolean isNextChar(char c)
        Checks to see if the next character matches the parameter
        参数:
        c - The character to check for
        返回:
        True if they match, false if not

      • isNextSeq

        public boolean isNextSeq(CharSequence seq)
        返回:
        true if the given sequence appears next in the array.

      • readFuncName

        public String readFuncName()
        返回:
        the name of the function

      • isEOF

        public boolean isEOF()
        返回:
        Whether or not the index is at the end of the character array

      • skipWhitespaces

        public void skipWhitespaces()
        Increments the mark over white spaces

        返回:
